name: r-deseq
description:
Differential gene expression analysis based on the negative binomial
distribution Estimate variance-mean dependence in count data from high-
throughput sequencing assays and test for differential expression based
on a model using the negative binomial distribution

dependencies.name: r
dependencies.description:
R is 'GNU S', a freely available language and environment for
statistical computing and graphics which provides a wide variety of
statistical and graphical techniques: linear and nonlinear modelling,
statistical tests, time series analysis, classification, clustering,
etc. Please consult the R project homepage for further information.

dependencies.name: r-biocgenerics
dependencies.description:
S4 generic functions used in Bioconductor The package defines S4 generic
functions used in Bioconductor.

dependencies.name: r-biobase
dependencies.description:
Biobase: Base functions for Bioconductor Functions that are needed by
many other packages or which replace R functions.

dependencies.name: r-locfit
dependencies.description:
Local regression, likelihood and density estimation Local regression,
likelihood and density estimation methods as described in the 1999 book
by Loader.

dependencies.name: r-lattice
dependencies.description:
Trellis Graphics for R A powerful and elegant high-level data
visualization system inspired by Trellis graphics, with an emphasis on
multivariate data. Lattice is sufficient for typical graphics needs, and
is also flexible enough to handle most nonstandard requirements. See
?Lattice for an introduction.

dependencies.name: r-genefilter
dependencies.description:
genefilter: methods for filtering genes from high-throughput experiments
Some basic functions for filtering genes.

dependencies.name: r-geneplotter
dependencies.description:
Graphics related functions for Bioconductor Functions for plotting
genomic data.

dependencies.name: r-mass
dependencies.description:
Support Functions and Datasets for Venables and Ripley's MASS Functions
and datasets to support Venables and Ripley, "Modern Applied Statistics
with S" (4th edition, 2002).

dependencies.name: r-rcolorbrewer
dependencies.description:
Provides color schemes for maps (and other graphics) designed by Cynthia
Brewer as described at http://colorbrewer2.org

dependent_to.name: py-tetoolkit
dependent_to.description:
TEToolkit is a software package that utilizes both unambiguously
(uniquely) and ambiguously (multi-) mapped reads to perform differential
enrichment analyses from high throughput sequencing experiments.

dependent_to.name: r-ampliqueso
dependent_to.description:
Analysis of amplicon enrichment panels. The package provides tools and
reports for the analysis of amplicon sequencing panels, such as AmpliSeq

dependent_to.name: r-rnaseqmap
dependent_to.description:
rnaSeq secondary analyses The rnaSeqMap library provides classes and
functions to analyze the RNA- sequencing data using the coverage
profiles in multiple samples at a time
